text.text_translated: I worked five days a week before. Then I was on leave for my children. After that, I wanted more time with my children. They will start school soon. I talked to my manager. We changed my work week. Now I work three days a week. Of course, my pay is much, much smaller. I get money only for the days I work. But, my work did not get less at all. I still do five days of work. I do it in three days. But I get much less pay for this.
